Column.Name: Parent Structure

TextCriterion.Text: [Setup Complete] = TRUE AND [LineNumber] = 1 AND [Status] <> 'Setup' AND [Status] <> 'Terminated' AND [Status] <> 'Cancelled' AND [Status] <> 'Expired' AND [Status] <> 'Contract Closed'

Label.Text: Select contracts to apply indexation to:
Preview of records that will be impacted by this indexation event
Add all contracts with listed indexation type

Note that the preview below is based on current values. If the value of a record would change prior to the indexation event being applied (e.g. an extension is exercised or a variation is approved) than the final adjusted values could be different.

Indexation run as an over night event. On confirmation the indexation event will be scheduled to begin at midnight of the current date. Ensure all selections made are correct before scheduling the action.
